thread.title: Judith
thread.title_full: American Frame americanframe.com reviewed by Judith

author: Judith
title: Judith
text: Customer Service rep during my recent frame purchase was extremely gracious and helpful, as usual, in answering questions about ordering protocols and availability of stock. The order arrived quickly and everything was carefully packed so all frame stock was in perfect condition. I am a long-term customer; I've always been extremely satisfied with product and service.
